value.title: COMPUTER VISION AND ROBOTICS EXPAND INDUSTRIAL CAPABILITIES
value.excerpt: One way to increase robotic abilities in a safe and efficient manner is to use an innovative new technology: computer vision. Computer vision technology enables a robot to use a camera or scanner to transform multidimensional inputs into data it can process, “perceiving” its surroundings and mimicking sight. value.title: How Will Your Career Be Impacted By Artificial Intelligence?
value.excerpt: Nobody can predict the future with absolute precision. But when it comes to the impact of artificial intelligence (AI) on people’s careers, the recent past provides some intriguing clues.
